original: @243a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @243a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sarba tantra hri da ya autta ra ha ya gr'i ba s'a dha nam /
analyzed: sarba tantra hri da ya autta ra ha ya gr'i ba s'a dha nam /
translated: Sarvatantrahrdayottarahayagrivasādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rgyud thams cad kyi snying po phyi ma'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs /
analyzed: rgyud thams cad kyi snying po phyi ma'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Achievement of Hayagrīva, the Subsequent Heart of All Tantras

original: dpal rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Hayagrīva.

original: de nas rta mgrin gyis sgrub thabs yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rta mgrin gyis sgrub thabs yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the means of achievement of Hayagrīva will be properly explained.

original: dang por re zhig sngags pas yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su bdud de rtsi lngas byugs te /
analyzed: dang por re zhig sngags pas yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su bdud de rtsi lngas byugs te /
translated: First, the mantrin, having anointed a place that is agreeable to the mind with the five cow products,

original: ji ltar rnyed pa'i stan la nye bar 'dug nas rang gi snying ga nas h'um yig gi 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas bla ma dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar spyad pa @243b thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /
analyzed: ji ltar rnyed pa'i stan la nye bar 'dug nas rang gi snying ga nas h'um yig gi 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas bla ma dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar spyad pa @243b thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang /
translated: having sat down on a seat that is found, having properly incited with the light rays of the syllable hūṃ from one's heart, having made offerings to the gurus, buddhas, and bodhisattvas with all enjoyments, having prostrated,

original: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas /
analyzed: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas /
translated: and having confessed misdeeds, and so on,

original: yang dag par brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: yang dag par brjod par bya ste /
translated: one should recite the following:

original: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
analyzed: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
translated: Oṃ svabhāva śuddhaḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ.

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Oṃ śūnyatā jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ.

original: sngags 'dis rang bzhin stong par bsgom par bya'o ;
analyzed: sngags 'dis rang bzhin stong par bsgom par bya'o ;
translated: By this mantra one should meditate on the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: / phyi nas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su padma 'dab ma bzhi pa'i ze'u 'bru'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i thod ba bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: / phyi nas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su padma 'dab ma bzhi pa'i ze'u 'bru'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i thod ba bsam par bya'o //
translated: Then, in the middle of the maṇḍala of space, on a moon maṇḍala seat on the pericarp of a four-petaled lotus, one should imagine a skull-cup filled with nectar.

original: de la h'um yig yongs su gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi thugs drag po rnam par bsam par bya ste /🔽zhal bzhi pa /
analyzed: de la h'um yig yongs su gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi thugs drag po rnam par bsam par bya ste / zhal bzhi pa /
translated: On that, one should imagine the syllable hūṃ, which transforms into the mind of the Buddha, Vajra Heruka.🔽He has four faces,

original: zhabs bzhi pa /
analyzed: zhabs bzhi pa /
translated: four feet,

original: g-yas bskum pa dag dang / g-yon brkyang ba dag go //
analyzed: g-yas bskum pa dag dang / g-yon brkyang ba dag go //
translated: the right legs contracted, and the left legs extended.

original: phyag brgyad pa /
analyzed: phyag brgyad pa /
translated: He has eight arms,

original: dpa' bo chen po lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor ba'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo chen po lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor ba'o //
translated: and is surrounded by four goddesses.

original: bdag nyid gang zhig grub 'dod pas //
analyzed: bdag nyid gang zhig grub 'dod pas //
translated: One who desires accomplishment

original: khyab bdag chen po rta mgrin ni //
analyzed: khyab bdag chen po rta mgrin ni //
translated: should visualize the great lord Hayagrīva.

original: sku mdog dmar po mche ba rno //
analyzed: sku mdog dmar po mche ba rno //
translated: His body is red, with sharp fangs.🔽His three eyes are red, black, and white,

original: spyan ni gsum pa dmar po dang // nag po dkar po rtsa ba dang / g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal nyid do //
analyzed: spyan ni gsum pa dmar po dang // nag po dkar po rtsa ba dang / g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal nyid do //
translated: the faces on the right and left.

original: steng zhal rta yi rnam pa la //
analyzed: steng zhal rta yi rnam pa la //
translated: The upper face is in the form of a horse,

original: b'a la sha yi kha dog bzhin //
analyzed: b'a la sha yi kha dog bzhin //
translated: the color of a bālasa tree.🔽A skull filled with blood,

original: thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang // sha chen chang nyid dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang // sha chen chang nyid dag kyang ngo //
translated: and also human flesh and beer.

original: rta yi zhal sogs dbu la ni //
analyzed: rta yi zhal sogs dbu la ni //
translated: The horse face and so on, on the head,

original: dbang bskur rab tu sbyin par bya /
analyzed: dbang bskur rab tu sbyin par bya /
translated: should be given the consecration.

original: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
analyzed: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
translated: Fully endowed with all ornaments,

original: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: adorned with a garland of skulls,🔽in his right hands he holds a hook, an arrow, a skull,

original: lcags kyu mda' dang thod pa dang // rdo rje rnams ni phyag g-yas na //🔽zhags pa gzhu dang kha tv'am ga //
analyzed: lcags kyu mda' dang thod pa dang // rdo rje rnams ni phyag g-yas na // zhags pa gzhu dang kha tv'am ga //
translated: and a vajra,🔽in his left hands a noose, a bow, a khaṭvāṅga,

original: dril bu rnams ni phyag g-yon na //
analyzed: dril bu rnams ni phyag g-yon na //
translated: and a bell.

original: bha ga'i dbus su sgrub pa pos //
analyzed: bha ga'i dbus su sgrub pa pos //
translated: In the center of the bhaga,

original: 'di lta bu nyid 'dir bsgom bya //
analyzed: 'di lta bu nyid 'dir bsgom bya //
translated: the practitioner should meditate on just this.

original: bdud rtsi lnga yis yang dag mchod //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga yis yang dag mchod //
translated: He should be properly worshipped with the five nectars,

original: mchod pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya //
analyzed: mchod pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya //
translated: and meditated on as the essence of worship.

original: shar du lha mo bri bar bya //
analyzed: shar du lha mo bri bar bya //
translated: One should draw the goddess in the east.

original: rta yi rdo rje 'jigs chen mo //
analyzed: rta yi rdo rje 'jigs chen mo //
translated: The great terrifying Horse-vajra

original: hr'i:yig las ni yang dag byung //
analyzed: hr'i:yig las ni yang dag byung //
translated: arises from the syllable HRĪḤ.

original: zhal gcig pa la phyag ni bzhi //🔽g-yon na gzhu dang thad pa la //🔽bdud rtsi dang bcas g-yas pa ni //
analyzed: zhal gcig pa la phyag ni bzhi // g-yon na gzhu dang thad pa la // bdud rtsi dang bcas g-yas pa ni //
translated: She has one face and four arms.🔽In the left [hands] she holds a bow and arrow,🔽and in the right [hands] a skull-cup

original: mda' nyid dang ni keng rus te //
analyzed: mda' nyid dang ni keng rus te //
translated: filled with nectar and a great arrow.

original: sna tshogs gzugs can 'bar ba ste //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs can 'bar ba ste //
translated: She has a blazing form of various colors.

original: lho ru phyag rgya bri bya ba //
analyzed: lho ru phyag rgya bri bya ba //
translated: One should draw the seal in the south.

original: zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi ba ste //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi ba ste //
translated: She has one face and four arms.

original: ham yig las ni yang dag bskyed //
analyzed: ham yig las ni yang dag bskyed //
translated: She is produced from the syllable HAṂ.

original: phyag g-yon kha tv'am ga dang ni //
analyzed: phyag g-yon kha tv'am ga dang ni //
translated: In the left [hands] she holds a khaṭvāṅga

original: khrag gis gang pa'i thod pa bsnams //
analyzed: khrag gis gang pa'i thod pa bsnams //
translated: and a skull-cup filled with blood.

original: g-yas na zhags pa chen po @244a * //
analyzed: g-yas na zhags pa chen po @244a * //
translated: In the right [hands] she holds a great noose

original: dang // keng rus brtul zhugs bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: dang // keng rus brtul zhugs bsnams pa'o //
translated: and a skeleton.

original: thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas pa'i //
analyzed: thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas pa'i //
translated: She sits in the middle of a skull seat,

original: sku mdog nag mo 'bar ba che //
analyzed: sku mdog nag mo 'bar ba che //
translated: black in color, with a great blazing form.

original: phag mo zhes pa bri bar bya //
analyzed: phag mo zhes pa bri bar bya //
translated: One should draw the goddess Vārāhī.

original: nub tu ce sbyang rdo rje ma //
analyzed: nub tu ce sbyang rdo rje ma //
translated: In the west, the goddess Śvānavaktrā,

original: thod pa'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs //
analyzed: thod pa'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs //
translated: sitting on a skull seat,

original: hr'i:yig las byung lha mo ni //
analyzed: hr'i:yig las byung lha mo ni //
translated: arises from the syllable HRĪḤ.

original: sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig ma //
analyzed: sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig ma //
translated: Her body is yellow, with one face,

original: phyag bzhi g-yon gyi thod pa na //
analyzed: phyag bzhi g-yon gyi thod pa na //
translated: and four arms. In the skull cup in her left hand

original: dri chen gyis gang rgyal mtshan zhags //
analyzed: dri chen gyis gang rgyal mtshan zhags //
translated: is feces, filled with a banner and noose.

original: g-yas kyis da ma ru dang ni //
analyzed: g-yas kyis da ma ru dang ni //
translated: In her right [hand] is a ḍamaru

original: keng rus brtul zhugs bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: keng rus brtul zhugs bsnams pa'o //
translated: and a skeleton, held as a pledge.

original: byang du phyag rgya bri bar bya //🔽sku mdog dkar mo rdo rje'i lag /'dab ma bzhi la bri bar bya //
analyzed: byang du phyag rgya bri bar bya // sku mdog dkar mo rdo rje'i lag /'dab ma bzhi la bri bar bya //
translated: One should draw the seal in the north,🔽with a body that is white, with a vajra in her hand.

original: cha bsags rta mgrin mchod par bya //
analyzed: cha bsags rta mgrin mchod par bya //
translated: One should draw her on four petals.

original: dri chen dri chu dang bcas pas //
analyzed: dri chen dri chu dang bcas pas //
translated: With feces and urine,

original: lha mo thams cad g-yas brkyang gi //🔽zhabs gnas 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs //
analyzed: lha mo thams cad g-yas brkyang gi // zhabs gnas 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs //
translated: all the goddesses stand on their right knees,🔽with feet extended, with garlands of blazing light.

original: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: They are adorned with a garland of skulls,

original: spyan gsum mche ba rno zhing 'jigs //
analyzed: spyan gsum mche ba rno zhing 'jigs //
translated: with three eyes, and with sharp, fearsome fangs.

original: bdag nyid dngos po grub 'dod gang gis //
analyzed: bdag nyid dngos po grub 'dod gang gis //
translated: Whoever desires to accomplish the nature of self

original: sngags kyi rgyal po dran par bya //
analyzed: sngags kyi rgyal po dran par bya //
translated: should recall the king of mantras.

original: de la sngags ni 'di'o //
analyzed: de la sngags ni 'di'o //
translated: The mantra is as follows:

original: aom ha ya gr'i ba hr'i:aa ham aa ham /
analyzed: aom ha ya gr'i ba hr'i:aa ham aa ham /
translated: Oṃ hā yagrāva hriḥ aham aham🔽āṃ āṃ

original: a'am a'am / h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: a'am a'am / h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: hūṃ hūṃ svāhā.

original: sngags 'di bsam gtan byas nas ni //
analyzed: sngags 'di bsam gtan byas nas ni //
translated: Having contemplated this mantra,

original: rtag tu bzlas shing dran par bya //
analyzed: rtag tu bzlas shing dran par bya //
translated: One should always recite and remember it.

original: 'bum phrag gnyis dang bye ba dang // stong phrag gcig gis nad med 'gyur //
analyzed: 'bum phrag gnyis dang bye ba dang // stong phrag gcig gis nad med 'gyur //
translated: By two hundred thousand, ten million, and one thousand, one will be free from illness.

original: sngon du nges par bsags pa yi //
analyzed: sngon du nges par bsags pa yi //
translated: Even previously accumulated

original: sdig pa'ang cung zad med par 'gyur //
analyzed: sdig pa'ang cung zad med par 'gyur //
translated: evil will be destroyed.

original: rnal 'byor dbang phyug dus kun du //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang phyug dus kun du //
translated: The lord of yoga, at all times,

original: srung bar byed cing bgegs med 'gyur //
analyzed: srung bar byed cing bgegs med 'gyur //
translated: will be protected and will have no obstacles.

original: de yi sems kyis rta yi zhal //
analyzed: de yi sems kyis rta yi zhal //
translated: With that mind, the horse-faced

original: lha mo sa khams brtan par bsgom //
analyzed: lha mo sa khams brtan par bsgom //
translated: goddess should be meditated as the earth element.

original: byams pa 'phrog pa'i sems kyis ni //
analyzed: byams pa 'phrog pa'i sems kyis ni //
translated: With a mind of loving kindness,

original: me long lta bu'i ye shes sbyor //
analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes sbyor //
translated: one should apply the mirror-like wisdom.

original: lha mo ce sbyang gdong de yis //
analyzed: lha mo ce sbyang gdong de yis //
translated: That goddess with the jackal face,

original: chu yi khams kyi dbang bskur nas //
analyzed: chu yi khams kyi dbang bskur nas //
translated: having consecrated the water element,

original: snying rjer gyur pa'i sems kyis ni //
analyzed: snying rjer gyur pa'i sems kyis ni //
translated: with a mind of compassion,

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes gzugs //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes gzugs //
translated: the form of the wisdom of equality.

original: phag mo zhal gyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: phag mo zhal gyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union with the face of Vārāhī,

original: me yis mi shes bsregs gyur nas //
analyzed: me yis mi shes bsregs gyur nas //
translated: having burned the ignorance of fire,

original: dga' bas rnams par dgyes pa yis //
analyzed: dga' bas rnams par dgyes pa yis //
translated: with joy, the one who is delighted,

original: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: is the wisdom of discernment.

original: lha mo glang po gdong de yis //
analyzed: lha mo glang po gdong de yis //
translated: That goddess with the elephant face,

original: rlung zhes mngon par brjod par bya //
analyzed: rlung zhes mngon par brjod par bya //
translated: It is called “wind.”

original: btang snyoms dran pa'i sems kyis ni //
analyzed: btang snyoms dran pa'i sems kyis ni //
translated: With a mind of equanimity and mindfulness,

original: bya ba grub pa'i sbyor ba las //
analyzed: bya ba grub pa'i sbyor ba las //
translated: from the application of accomplishing activities,

original: sems ni dkar po'i gzugs kyis ni //
analyzed: sems ni dkar po'i gzugs kyis ni //
translated: the mind in the form of a white light

original: sna tshogs gzugs su mngon par brjod //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs su mngon par brjod //
translated: is called “the form of various things.”

original: snying rjes brlan pa'i chos rnams ni //
analyzed: snying rjes brlan pa'i chos rnams ni //
translated: The phenomena moistened by compassion

original: nag po'i sgra yi sgra nyid @244b la ;
analyzed: nag po'i sgra yi sgra nyid @244b la ;
translated: are the sound of the sound of the black syllable.

original: / dkar po sdig pa 'joms pa ste //
analyzed: / dkar po sdig pa 'joms pa ste //
translated: The white syllable conquers evil;

original: ser po dri ma med pa'i cha //
analyzed: ser po dri ma med pa'i cha //
translated: the yellow syllable is the stainless phenomenon.

original: dmar po byed pa'i chos rnams kyi //
analyzed: dmar po byed pa'i chos rnams kyi //
translated: The red syllable is the phenomena of action.

original: chags pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs //🔽zhabs bzhi rnam par dag pa ni //
analyzed: chags pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs // zhabs bzhi rnam par dag pa ni //
translated: The tathāgata is the mind of passion.🔽The four pure feet

original: de yi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi //
analyzed: de yi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi //
translated: are the four bases of miraculous powers.

original: rnam pa bzhi bo 'di yis ni //
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi bo 'di yis ni //
translated: By these four aspects,

original: zhal nyid kyang ni 'dir gsungs so //
analyzed: zhal nyid kyang ni 'dir gsungs so //
translated: the face is also explained here.

original: sems kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' mtshungs //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' mtshungs //
translated: The nature of the mind is the same as space.

original: chos dbyings rnam par dag pa las //
analyzed: chos dbyings rnam par dag pa las //
translated: From the pure sphere of phenomena,

original: lam ni rnam par dag pa yis //
analyzed: lam ni rnam par dag pa yis //
translated: the path is pure.

original: gsang ba thob par mngon par brjod //
analyzed: gsang ba thob par mngon par brjod //
translated: The attainment of the secret is explained.

original: gang tshe rgyu yi de nyid mthong //
analyzed: gang tshe rgyu yi de nyid mthong //
translated: When the suchness of the cause is seen,

original: 'bras de nyid kyis rgyas btab bo //
analyzed: 'bras de nyid kyis rgyas btab bo //
translated: It is sealed with the very same fruit.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi //
translated: The Blessed Buddha himself

original: thar ba spyan gyis gzigs pa nyid //
analyzed: thar ba spyan gyis gzigs pa nyid //
translated: sees liberation with the eye.

original: shes rab med cing sems med pa'i //
analyzed: shes rab med cing sems med pa'i //
translated: Those without wisdom, without mind,

original: dud 'gro'i gdong can rnams kyis mthong //
analyzed: dud 'gro'i gdong can rnams kyis mthong //
translated: with animal faces, see it.

original: bla ma dam pa'i gsung las ni //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa'i gsung las ni //
translated: From the speech of the excellent guru,

original: lha yi rnal 'byor gyis sbyangs pa //
analyzed: lha yi rnal 'byor gyis sbyangs pa //
translated: purified by the yoga of the deity,

original: rgyud thams cad kyi snying po phyi ma'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: rgyud thams cad kyi snying po phyi ma'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The sadhana of Hayagriva of the future, the essence of all tantras, is complete.

original: // / pandi ta pra bh'a ka ras mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: // / pandi ta pra bh'a ka ras mdzad pa'o //
translated: Composed by the pandit Prabhakara.
